requestParams.name: idempotent_no
requestParams.desc: 幂等单号（请求唯一标识）

requestParams.name: source
requestParams.desc: 请求来源（需调用方自定义标识：OPEN_XXXX）

requestParams.name: warehouse_id
requestParams.desc: 门店或独立仓id   注意：连锁版必填

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['idempotent_no']="aaa"
params['is_finish']="true"
params['operator_name']="admin"
params['remark']="测试盘点"
params['source']="test"
params['stock_check_create_items']="[{"sku_no":"ereerer","specifications":"","unit":"件","product_name":"热干面1111","sku_id":7394908,"real_amount":111000}]"
params['warehouse_id']=40689202

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.stockcheck.create', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'aaa', 'is_finish' => 'true', 'operator_name' => 'admin', 'remark' => '测试盘点', 'source' => 'test', 'stock_check_create_items' => '[{"sku_no":"ereerer","specifications":"","unit":"件","product_name":"热干面1111","sku_id":7394908,"real_amount":111000}]', 'warehouse_id' => '40689202', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
